titleInfo.title: Identity politics and the political field – a theoretical approach to modelling a 'field of identity politics'
New World Colors: Ethnicity, Belonging, and Difference in the Americas

bibliographicCitation.angewandte-chemie: H. Schäfer, in New World Colors: Ethnicity, Belonging, and Difference in the Americas (Ed.: J. Raab), Wissenschaftlicher Verlag Trier U.a., Trier u.a., 2014, p. 375-399.

Schäfer H (2014)
Identity politics and the political field – a theoretical approach to modelling a 'field of identity politics'.
